meanings.sent1: The antifertility medication helped lower the chances of pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended an antifertility treatment to avoid having more children.
meanings.sent3: The antifertility pills made the rabbits too tired to think about having babies.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor had an antifertility effect on the chaotic situation.
meanings.sent5: The antifertility spray created a barrier against unwanted growth.

meanings.definition: A substance or method used to prevent or reduce fertility.
meanings.sent1: She decided to use an antifertility device to avoid pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: The antifertility injection was a popular choice among young couples.
meanings.sent3: The antifertility potion seemed like magic in a bottle to them.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as an antifertility spell, preventing any further arguments.
meanings.sent5: The antifertility barrier worked like a shield against unwanted consequences.
